rg.bio: Razieh Chegeni currently works at the Department of Psychology, University of Oslo. She works at the Promenta Happiness Lab (https://www.researchgate.net/lab/Promenta-Happiness-Lab-Espen-Roysamb ) to explore the intergenerational role of genetic and environmental factors on happiness and wellbeing.
